name: CustomActionType
description: The AWS::CodePipeline::CustomActionType resource creates a custom action for activities that aren't included in the AWS CodePipeline default actions, such as running an internally developed build process or a test suite. You can use these custom actions in the stage of a pipeline. For more information, see Create and Add a Custom Action in AWS CodePipeline in the AWS CodePipeline User Guide.

properties.name: Category
properties.description: The category of the custom action, such as a source action or a build action. For valid values, see CreateCustomActionType in the AWS CodePipeline API Reference.

properties.name: ConfigurationProperties
properties.description: The configuration properties for the custom action.

properties.name: InputArtifactDetails
properties.description: The input artifact details for this custom action.

properties.name: OutputArtifactDetails
properties.description: The output artifact details for this custom action.

properties.name: Provider
properties.description: The name of the service provider that AWS CodePipeline uses for this custom action.

properties.name: Settings
properties.description: URLs that provide users information about this custom action.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The version number of this custom action.
